education.title: Scientific Baccalaureate
education.summary: Engineering Sciences, option Computer and Digital Sciences

experiences.summary:
• Creation of an application for Buddy robot (emotive robot) on Android allowing to control it via JavaScript

  • Complete overhaul of the Vittascience site with Bootstrap 5 for the internationalization of the site via the implementation of right-to-left reading direction, and with the creation of a custom theme

  • Maintenance and evolution of the open-source project OpenSTEAM-LMS for several clients (Texas Instruments, AREN...)

  • Complete overhaul of an ASP.NET site to PHP in 6 months (MaClasseTI.fr)

  • Mentoring of an apprentice (Bac+2) over 1 year

• Integration of Adobe XD mockups on the open source project OpenSTEAM-LMS and Vittascience

    • Setting up a theme system via CSS variables following the LMS's transition to open source

  • Setting up a new design for the store, using UX/UI knowledge acquired on the Classe platform

  • Realization of the new homepage of the site with various landing pages for different projects
